data.title: Robert Black Associates
data.meta_description: ARCHITECT 44 years experience – active licenses in VT, MA, VA, OH, MI & MN.  NCARB Certified. Schools, churches, municipal/corporate offices, high-tech research centers, medical facilities, new homes, and residential…
data.text:
ARCHITECT

44 years experience – active licenses in VT, MA, VA, OH, MI & MN. NCARB Certified.

Schools, churches, municipal/corporate offices, high-tech research centers, medical facilities, new homes, and residential additions/renovations.

Intention: To foster respectful collaboration for cost-effective success on every project.

Available Services:

Architectural programming, planning, design, construction for commercial facilities.

New home planning and design.

Residential remodeling and additions. (“FineHometuning”)

TEACHER

22 years High School and University Graduate level experience.

Developed special course for Waldorf School 12th Grade: “History through Architecture”.

Community classes for Art, History, human consciousness, personal / group effectiveness.

Available services:

Single or multi-class experiences on a variety of subjects for your group or organization.

Youth and Elder classes for creative expression, confidence building, group dynamics.

PROFESSIONAL FACILITATOR & COMMUNITY BUILDER

Effective processes to help people of differing philosophies rally around commonly held values.

Speaker at local, national and international conferences on wide-ranging topics:

Energy, Sustainability, Philosophy, Human Consciousness and Anthroposophical Architecture.

Trustee / Officer of non-profit organizations: The Carving Studio & Sculpture Center, West Rutland, The Compass Music and Arts Foundation, Brandon, The Henry Sheldon Museum, Middlebury.

Current Chair, Downtown Brandon Alliance Design Committee

Second term member of the Vermont Community Foundation.

Available Services:

Professional facilitation for non-profits, churches, schools, businesses, arts organizations, etc.

Motivational speaker on a variety of subjects (fund-raising, etc.) for events and gatherings.

ARTIST & DESIGNER

Photography, Photo-collage Art, Graphic Design, Video Documentary, Art Exhibit Curation, Art Gallery Installations, Improvisational Dance/Theatre, Music, Spanish language, Carpentry, Woodworking.

Available services:
